Container.Name: n8n
Container.Overview: Fair-code workflow automation platform with native AI capabilities. Combine visual building with custom code, self-host or cloud, and hundreds of integrations.

Config.Name: GENERIC_TIMEZONE
Config.Description: The n8n instance timezone. Important for schedule nodes (such as Cron).

Config.Name: N8N_DEFAULT_LOCALE
Config.Description: A locale identifier, compatible with the Accept-Language header. n8n doesn't support regional identifiers, such as de-AT. When running in a locale other than the default, n8n displays UI strings in the selected locale, and falls back to en for any untranslated strings.

Config.Name: N8N_PORT
Config.Description: The HTTP port n8n runs on.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: The port for n8n web interface.

Config.Name: EXECUTIONS_DATA_MAX_AGE
Config.Description: The execution age (in hours) before it's deleted.

Config.Name: N8N_EDITOR_BASE_URL
Config.Description: Public URL where users can access the editor. Also used for emails sent from n8n and the redirect URL for SAML based authentication.

Config.Name: N8N_HIRING_BANNER_ENABLED
Config.Description: Whether to show the n8n hiring banner in the console (true) or not (false).

Config.Name: N8N_LOG_FORMAT
Config.Description: The log format to use. text prints human readable messages. json prints one JSON object per line containing the message, level, timestamp, and all metadata. This is useful for production monitoring as well as debugging.

Config.Name: N8N_PROXY_HOPS
Config.Description: Number of reverse-proxies n8n is running behind.

Config.Name: N8N_SECURE_COOKIE
Config.Description: Ensures that cookies are only sent over HTTPS, enhancing security.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the process and file permissions.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the process and file permissions.
